waraya, guwanthotupala, adhiwegi marga men asata nopenunath adhyapana kshethraye siduwa athi dawantha sanwardhanaya rajaya pasugiya yugaye labu wishishtathama jayagrahanaya bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.ada rate pasal daruwan wishala pragathiyak ath kara gena athi bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya ape anagatha parapura kerehi thama thula dadi wishwasayak athi bawath prakasha kaleya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me adahas pala kale kolambaa dewi balika widyalaye warshika thyaga pradanothsawaya saha mahindodaya widyagaraya wiwrutha kirime ulelata 25wani da ekwemini.janadhipathiwaraya ehidi wadi duratath mese da pawasiya.dewi balika widyalaye thyaga pradanothsawayata awith obath ekka sathuta beda ganna labima gana mama ithama sathutu wenawa.

loka uruma sinharaja wanantharaye mayim aashritha pradesha elipehali kirime wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka wana bawata parisarawedin chodana karanawa.me athara sinharaja wanantharaya thula sidukaragena giya gas kapime jawaramak heli kara ganimata wishesha karya balakaya samath wi thibenawa.merata sathu watinama swabhawika sampath atharin pramukhasthanayak ganna sinharaja wanantharaya ihala jaiwa wiwidhathwayakin yuktha parisara paddhathiyak.hektayara 11,187 ka wapasariyakin hebi mema dawantha urumayata minis kriyakarakam hethuwen siduwana ahithakara balapam pilibandawa pasugiya kalaya purama wartha wuna.kese wethath, madhyama parisara adhikariye sabhapathi siripala amarasinha mahatha eeye aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata paminillak idiripath kale sinharaja wanantharaya aashritha bhumiyaka siduwana idikirimakata thama sambandha bawata wana chodana gana wimarshanayak sidukarana lesata illamin.me athara, sinharaja wananthaya thula gas kapamin siti pudgalayin siw deneku wishesha karya balakaya sidukala wishesha watalimakadi athadanguwata gena thibenawa.me athara, dambaulla, wawalawawa ha sigiriya - alakolawawa aadi pradeshawala rajaye idam athpathkara ganim sambandhayen madhyayata thorathuru dun bawata chodana karamin kisiyam pirisak wisin pudgalayekuta pahara di thibenawa.melesa pahara kamata lakwu ee.ji. disanayaka nam gowi mahatha me wanawita dambaulla mulika rohale prathikara labanawa.me athara, diyabeduma, konduruwawa pradeshaye moragahakanda jalashayen uthuru palathata jalaya ragena yana uman margaya idikirima sandaha palamak idikirimata pradeshaye kumbauk gas rasak kapa dama athi bawata pradeshawasin chodana karanawa.eeta amatharawa, adala wyapruthiye sewakayinta nawathan ganima sandaha idikerena newasikagaraya aashrithawa da gas wishala washayen kapa dama athi aakaraya apata daknata labuna.
